short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Tab Reminder allows users to set calendar dates for when they'd like URL tabs to reappear on their browser.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Organize your browser chaos, save your mental health, and tame your tabs today. Tab Reminder allows users to set calendar dates for when they'd like URL tabs to reappear on their browser.
